goals.question: What is the trend of CO2 concentration over time?
goals.visualization: line chart of CO2 concentration over time
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if the CO2 concentration is increasing, decreasing or remaining constant over time.

goals.question: What is the distribution of CO2 concentration?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the range of CO2 concentration values and their frequency of occurrence.

goals.question: What is the relationship between CO2 and adjusted CO2?
goals.visualization: scatter plot of CO2 vs adjusted CO2
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is a correlation between CO2 and adjusted CO2 values.

goals.question: What is the average CO2 concentration over the years?
goals.visualization: bar chart of average CO2 concentration per year
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the average CO2 concentration per year and if there is any significant change over the years.

goals.question: What is the distribution of CO2 concentration per year?
goals.visualization: box plot of CO2 concentration per year
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the distribution of CO2 concentration values per year and if there are any outliers or significant changes over the years.

code:
```
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax = sns.lineplot(x='Date', y='CO2', data=data)
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    plt.title('What is the trend of CO2 concentration over time?', wrap=True)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)
```

import seaborn as sns
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax = sns.histplot(data=data, x='CO2', bins=20)
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.title('What is the distribution of CO2 concentration?', wrap=True)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax = sns.scatterplot(x='CO2', y='adjusted_CO2', data=data)
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    plt.title('What is the relationship between CO2 and adjusted CO2?', wrap=True)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    data['Year'] = data['Date'].dt.year
    avg_co2 = data.groupby('Year')['CO2'].mean().reset_index()
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    ax = sns.barplot(x='Year', y='CO2', data=avg_co2)
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.title('What is the average CO2 concentration over the years?', wrap=True)
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    data['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['Date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='ignore')
    data['Year'] = data['Date'].dt.year
    ax = sns.boxplot(x='Year', y='CO2', data=data)
    ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.title('What is the distribution of CO2 concentration per year?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
